GeneratedDoc.name: entity
GeneratedDoc.Intro: This table lists a bunch of columns that have different information in them. We want to say something about htem, but don't know what to say.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Type of entity. This field supports both entity and group types.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Entityâ€™s current display name. While display names may change over time, the data tracks only the most recent display name.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: The kind of environment the entity exists in.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Information that is specific for the given entity type.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: A topology timestamp for when this entity first appeared.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: A topology timestamp for when this entity last appeared.
A value of 9999-12-31T23:59:59 means the entity still exists in latest market cycle.
